EmailTemplate.description: Used to notify that Relationship Document Exception Date Has Passed
EmailTemplate.name: ET42 - Relationship Document Exception Date has Passed
EmailTemplate.subject: *** Relationship Document Exception Date Has Passed - Relationship "{!Account.Name}" ***
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Organization.Name} Team Member,
A Relationship Document Exception Date for Relationship {!Account.Name} has passed.
Document Name: {!LLC_BI__AccountDocument__c.Name} Exception Date: {!LLC_BI__AccountDocument__c.LLC_BI__exceptionDate__c}
Click here for full details: {!Account.Link}.
nCino
ET42
